member.name: T:Windows.ApplicationModel.Activation.ILockScreenCallActivatedEventArgs
member.summary: Provides event information when communication to and from the lock screen is required.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Activation.ILockScreenCallActivatedEventArgs.CallUI
member.summary: Gets the UI that handles communication to and from the lock screen.
member.returns: The UI that handles communication to and from the lock screen.

member.name: T:Windows.ApplicationModel.Activation.IPrint3DWorkflowActivatedEventArgs
member.summary: Provides information about an event that occurs when the app is launched as a workflow for three-dimensional printing.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Activation.IPrint3DWorkflowActivatedEventArgs.Workflow
member.summary: Gets the workflow that the app should use for three-dimensional printing.
member.returns: The workflow that the app should use for three-dimensional printing.

member.name: T:Windows.ApplicationModel.Activation.IPrintTaskSettingsActivatedEventArgs
member.summary: Provides information in response to the event that is raised when print task settings are activated.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Activation.IPrintTaskSettingsActivatedEventArgs.Configuration
member.summary: Gets the configuration information for the print task.

member.name: T:Windows.ApplicationModel.Activation.LockScreenCallActivatedEventArgs
member.summary: Provides event information when communication to and from the lock screen is required.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Activation.LockScreenCallActivatedEventArgs.Arguments
member.summary: Gets the arguments that are passed to the app to launch it.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Activation.LockScreenCallActivatedEventArgs.CallUI
member.summary: Gets the UI that handles communication to and from the lock screen.
member.returns: The UI that handles communication to and from the lock screen.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Activation.LockScreenCallActivatedEventArgs.CurrentlyShownApplicationViewId
member.summary: Gets the identifier for the currently shown app view.
member.returns: The identifier for the currently shown app view.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Activation.LockScreenCallActivatedEventArgs.Kind
member.summary: Gets the activation type.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Activation.LockScreenCallActivatedEventArgs.PreviousExecutionState
member.summary: Gets the execution state of the app before it was activated.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Activation.LockScreenCallActivatedEventArgs.SplashScreen
member.summary: Gets the splash screen object, which provides information about the transition from the splash screen to the activated app.
member.returns: The object that provides splash screen information.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Activation.LockScreenCallActivatedEventArgs.TileId
member.summary: Gets the identifier of the source that launched the app.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Activation.LockScreenCallActivatedEventArgs.ViewSwitcher
member.summary: Gets the view switcher object that allows you to set the view for the application.
member.returns: Use the ActivationViewSwitcher to show or switch the view in response to the activation. The value will be **null** in hosted scenarios such as Share and File Picker activations.

member.name: T:Windows.ApplicationModel.Activation.Print3DWorkflowActivatedEventArgs
member.summary: Provides information about an event that occurs when the app is launched as a 3D printing workflow.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Activation.Print3DWorkflowActivatedEventArgs.Kind
member.summary: Gets the activation type.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Activation.Print3DWorkflowActivatedEventArgs.PreviousExecutionState
member.summary: Gets the execution state of the app before it was activated.

member.summary: Gets the splash screen object that provides information about the transition from the splash screen to the activated app.
member.returns: The object that provides splash screen information.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Activation.Print3DWorkflowActivatedEventArgs.Workflow
member.summary: Gets a customized printing experience for a 3D printer.
member.returns: The customized printing experience for a 3D printer.

member.name: T:Windows.ApplicationModel.Activation.PrintTaskSettingsActivatedEventArgs
member.summary: Provides information in response to the event that is raised when print task settings are activated.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Activation.PrintTaskSettingsActivatedEventArgs.Configuration
member.summary: Gets the configuration information for the print task.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Activation.PrintTaskSettingsActivatedEventArgs.Kind
member.summary: Gets the activation type for the print task settings.
member.returns: The type of activation for the print task.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Activation.PrintTaskSettingsActivatedEventArgs.PreviousExecutionState
member.summary: Gets the execution state of the app before the settings were activated.
member.returns: The execution state of the app.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Activation.PrintTaskSettingsActivatedEventArgs.SplashScreen
member.summary: Gets the splash screen object which provides information about the transition from the splash screen to the activated app.
